actions.text: Ordered to lie over under the rule.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate with respect to United Nations Security Council Resolution 425, relating to the Lebanese crisis.

summary.text: Declares it the sense of the Senate that United Nations Security Council Resolution 425, relating to the Lebanon crisis, should be implemented and that all parties concerned should comply with the resolution.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate with respect to United Nations Security Council Resolution 425, relating to the Lebanese crisis.
